_sText:
This is one freaking crazy map, With 20 players a team, Only 4 rooms, and hallways in between, You'll experience extreme-fast paced action!!

Tip: Most guns can peirce these walls, So if an enemy runs out of sight, Spamming the walls may net you a kill, or two... Or maybe 5 if you're lucky :D

This is the Saturday, 25 November 2006 version, A much better improvement from first version where you would hit your head jumping, and all props removed from both spawns so you can actually run around now! 

I won't be updating this version, But there may be sequels of HallwayBlitz so stay tuned!

PS: HallwayBlitz2 is has been released in some places but here, I will be updating that version by getting rid of the props in those spawns as well.
